long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "CouponBuddy" is a Chrome extension designed to effortlessly guide users to exclusive discounts and savings through affiliate links. As users explore products or services online, the extension smartly identifies available discounts and promotional offers. By clicking on the designated links provided by "CouponBuddy", users are redirected to product pages where discounts are automatically applied, ensuring they benefit from the best deals available.
